      • create

        public net.trajano.doxdb.DoxMeta create(java.lang.String schemaName,
                               org.bson.BsonDocument bson)
        Description copied from interface: DoxLocal
        Creates a dox record into the database. This will allocate a "_id" value for the record.
        Specified by:
        create in interface DoxLocal
        Parameters:
        schemaName - collection name
        bson - dox contents as a BSON. The contents MUST be valid for the schema.
        Returns:
        dox meta with contents with "_id" and "_version" set.
